Reviews.Title: What an honest name "Clap"
Reviews.Author: Iain White "chalky"
Reviews.Content: This is a terrific idea, tiny and super convenient.I think it would make a great present for a young child if it cost about $10 but at its "real price" it is overpriced for something that takes awful pictures.I may be being unfair.  I've only used it for the past two hours and tried taken pictures indoors (on a bright day) as well as in bright lit conditions.All my pics so far are totally blurred.I may upgrade my assessment to 2 stars if it works outdoors but so far extremely disappointed.My second gripe is that it is very hard to know if you have taken a photo or not.  with no audible click (and no playback) its hard to know. There is a little light on the front of the camera that blinks on and off but given its on the front you can't see it.  So far I only took about 1/2 of those I thought I'd taken and having now seen them, wish I hadn't.I love toys but this really does seem like useless Clap.

Reviews.Title: Too small
Reviews.Author: Barbara Duke
Reviews.Content: I still haven't figured out this little camera. It is so small, so if you have bad eyesight, it is too small for you. I am sure someone with a better understanding of technology would like it better. It is cute, but I don't think it is worth the money paid for it. I haven't got one picture out of it yet. It has been frustrating.

ProductInfo.Features:
Photo and Movie Feature, 2 MP
Utilizes Micro SD Card up to 16GB (Not included)
Plugs directly into your USB
For Windows and Mac, No Driver needed
1280 x 1024 Resolution, Fine Glass Lens
ProductInfo.Name: Superheadz CLAP Digital Camera Powershovel White
